tweet: Wow! @SergeyNazarov and @chainlink were kind enough to walk my dumb self through the real can's and cant's of what they do and how it really works, and I'm very grateful. Much to think about, but clarity is a great gift to receive this #blockchain holiday season.

@PureNukage @SergeyNazarov @chainlink @AppDirect It's an important and practical middleware function, bringing together data sources on one side and stored procedures on any database-cum-blockchain and have more confidence in who is providing what information to whom...and not have to write the listeners from scratch.

@PureNukage @SergeyNazarov @chainlink I was reminded of @AppDirect in a way. Or EMBs. What really put it together for me was realizing that, strictly speaking, you could take the federated and carefully vetted Oracle nodes and put the parameters they supply into any function...technically.

>node operators can automatically convert profits to USD >they are building this, safe to assume they have reason to believe it will be useful >running a $link node will be profitable   this is the type of thing that will allow any developer to leverage @chainlink’s value
